oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Long-term survival and infectivity of porcine helminths on paddocks in relation to ploughing
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mejer, Helena
Thamsborg, Stig Milan
Roepstorff, Allan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The effect of ploughing on long-term survival and infectivity of the free-living stages of Ascaris suum, Trichuris suis and Oesophagostomum dentatum on pastures were followed in a 14-year study.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Mejer, Helena; Thamsborg, Stig Milan and Roepstorff, Allan (2014) Long-term survival and infectivity of porcine helminths on paddocks in relation to ploughing. Veterinary Parasitology. [Completed]
